ing: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
1 (5.4 ounce) package KnorrÂ® Fiesta Sidesâ„¢ - Yellow Rice
des: "A delicious dinner of seasoned yellow rice, lime chicken with diced avocado and tomato is on the table in less than 30 minutes."
ins:
Season chicken, if desired, with salt and pepper or Knorr(R) Chicken flavor Bouillon. Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and cook chicken, stirring frequently, until chicken is thoroughly cooked, about 5 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Remove and set aside.
Prepare Knorr(R) Fiesta Sides(TM) - Yellow Rice in same skillet according to package directions.
Stir in chicken, avocado and tomato until well blended. Top, if desired, with shredded Cheddar cheese, chopped red onion, and cilantro.
